SELECT IFNULL(pdf.model_type,'') chNos, IFNULL(pdf.value,'') stateName, pdf.ch_type state, CONCAT(a.id) id, tc.name devName, a.dev_type devType, IFNULL(d.mac,d.imei) mac, b.online online, CONCAT(a.addr) addr, a.del_flag allWarn, 1 meter, a.firmware_version firmwareVersion, c.name gateway, d.bus_addr busAddr, CONCAT('/static_modules/device/',tc.icon_skin) iconSkin,
1 allCount, 1 useCount from t_device a left join (select * from pdf_code where STATUS = 25) pdf on pdf.dev_type = a.dev_type LEFT JOIN t_code tc on tc.id = a.dev_type and tc.type_id = a.type_id left join t_device_detail b on a.id = b.id left join t_device c on c.id = a.parent_id left join t_device_detail d on d.id = a.id left join t_org o on o.id = a.org_id
(a.org_id = #{orgId} or o.parent_ids like CONCAT('%',#{orgId},'%')) and a.dev_type not in (150,183,109,2,141,222,252)
and a.id = #{devId}
order by SUBSTRING_INDEX(b.mac, '_', 1) desc, SUBSTRING_INDEX(b.mac, '_', -1) +0

SELECT IFNULL(pdf.value,'') stateName, IFNULL(pdf.ch_type,0) type, CONCAT(c.id) chId, CONCAT(c.dev_id) devId, c.ch_type, c.type_id, c.name AS "chName", c.channel_type AS "channelType", CONCAT(IFNULL(c.addr,''),c.name) AS "addr", c.param0, c.param1, c.param2, c.ch_no, c.online online, e.name AS "codeName", IFNULL(FORMAT((real_value-param2)/param1,param0),'0') realValue, CONCAT(c.logic_org_id) loopOrgId, IFNULL(warn,'0') warn , IFNULL(r.real_time,'') realTime, IFNULL(e.monad,'') AS "monad" FROM t_channel c left join t_real_data r on r.id = c.id INNER join t_device d on d.id = c.dev_id LEFT JOIN t_code e ON e.id = c.ch_type AND e.type_id = c.type_id left join (select * from pdf_code where STATUS = 26) pdf on pdf.dev_type = d.dev_type and c.ch_no = pdf.model_type left join t_org o on o.id = d.org_id
(d.org_id = #{orgId} or o.parent_ids like CONCAT('%',#{orgId} ,'%')) and (c.ch_type not in (24,25))
and d.id = #{devId} and (c.ch_type not in (24,25))

SELECT param0 orderNo, IFNULL(m.id,'') chId, a.channel_type channelType, CONCAT(a.id) id, IFNULL(td.unit_type,'') minutes, CONCAT(a.logic_org_id) orgId, CONCAT(IFNULL(a.addr,''),a.name) name, a.del_flag type, CONCAT(a.outer_id) src, b.name orgName, CONCAT('rtmp://192.168.128.31/live/ch',a.ch_no) local_src, CONCAT('/static_modules/channel/',tc.icon_skin) iconSkin, td.sn, a.ch_no chNo, a.play_url0, a.play_url1, a.play_url2 from t_channel a LEFT JOIN t_code tc on tc.id = a.channel_type and tc.type_id = a.type_id inner join (select * from t_org where type = 5) b on a.logic_org_id = b.id inner join t_device td on a.dev_id = td.id left join (select CONCAT(o.ch_id) id from pdf_user_video o where o.user_id = #{userId}) m on m.id = a.id where a.ch_type =1 and a.type_id = 9 and a.del_flag= 0 ORDER BY param0,a.ch_no

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(history_time,'%H') time, h.ch_id chId, ROUND(avg(history_value),3) historyValue, c.ch_no chNo, d.addr, c.name from t_channel c inner join t_device d on d.id= c.dev_id inner join t_history_data_final h on h.ch_id = c.id where d.dev_type = #{devType} and ch_type = #{chType} AND
d.org_id = #{orgId} and
history_time >= #{time} and history_time <=concat(#{time},' 23:59:59') GROUP BY ch_id,DATE_FORMAT(history_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H') order by ch_id
SELECT c.name, d.dev_type devType, ch_type chType, c.type_id typeId from t_device d inner join pdf_code c on c.dev_type = d.dev_type where c.status = 27 and c.ch_type != 0 GROUP BY c.id
select id, name, en_name, chNo, chType, notUse, order_no from pdf_device_code where dev_type = #{devType} order by order_no
mapper.update: UPDATE pdf_device_code set notUse =0,order_no = 100 where dev_type = #{devType}
UPDATE pdf_device_code set notUse =#{notUse},order_no = #{orderNo} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select pd.name, pd.en_name, pd.dev_type,pd.chNo,pd.chType,pd.order_no orderNo,pd.notUse from pdf_device_code pd inner join t_device d on d.dev_type = pd.dev_type where pd.notUse = 1 and d.org_id = #{orgId} GROUP BY pd.id ORDER BY pd.dev_type,pd.order_no
